name: Heavy Iron Studios Package
summary: A HIP file is an asset archive used by Scooby-Doo: Night of 100 Frights, The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie, or another Heavy Iron Studios Evil Engine video game. It contains game resources, such as 3D models, textures, audio files, and/or animations. These assets are used to display levels, characters, and in-game menus.
